full_summary:
=====

**Solicitation Details**

| Category | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Title | Purchase of Lifting Device for DND |
| Solicitation Reference Number | SSC-24-00026519:T |
| Amendment Number | Amendment 004 |
| Solicitation Number | BPM021420/26519 |
| Publication Date | May 22, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | June 19, 2024 at 10:49:11 |

**Procurement Details**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) Solicitation
* Competitive – Open Bidding Procurement Method
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contractor Details**

* Contractor Name: Shared Services Canada
* Contractor Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0B6
* Contact Information: Clara Whittaker
	+ Phone: 343-553-8354
	+ Fax: 343-553-8354

**Goods or Services Required**

The solicitation is for the purchase of a Lifting Device and related technical specifications.

**Instructions for Registration**

Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to access solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates. To register, please go to https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click Register Now.

**Correspondence**

Please direct any correspondence, questions, or concerns to Clara Whittaker at 343-553-8354 or Fax to 343-553-8354.

**Attachments**

Refer to the attached documents for additional information.
